data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Đà Nẵng, Vietnam.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Đà Nẵng, Vietnam

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 23,792 believers in the state of Đà Nẵng to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Đà Nẵng, Vietnam who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Đà Nẵng, Vietnam a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Trieng people.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Đà Nẵng, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Đà Nẵng, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.section_summary:
the state of Đà Nẵng, Vietnam has a population of 1,100,000.

We estimate Đà Nẵng has 23,792 people who might know Jesus, 88,234 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 987,974 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Đà Nẵng, Vietnam that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.
